prompt: Imagine you are a global geography expert. Your task is to identify the country with the largest land area from a given list. The input will be a series of country names, and you need to identify and output the name of the largest country in terms of territorial extension from this list. The country names will be given as a string, separated by commas. It's important to note that you should take into account only the territorial extension, not the population size or any other factors. Keep your response concise; only the name of the country with the largest land area should be outputted.

As an AI, your task is to evaluate a list of countries and determine which one is the largest in terms of territorial extension. You will be given a list of different countries and you are to return the one with the largest land area. It's important to remember that you should not consider the population or any other factor – only the size of the country based on its land area matters. Make sure to provide your answer as a country's full, official name. Keep in mind, you must provide your evaluation based on the input you receive, without any external help or data.

Your goal is to identify the country with the largest territorial extension from a given list of countries. You will receive a comma-separated list of country names and you need to analyze which one of those is the biggest in terms of land area. Your output should be the name of that country. Remember to provide only one response - just the name of the largest country from the list.

Given a list of countries, your task is to identify and respond with the name of the country that has the largest territorial extension. You will need to analyze each country in the given list and use your knowledge of world geography to determine the largest one in terms of land area. Remember to respond with just the name of the country.

As an AI, your task is to analyze a list of countries given in the input and identify the one with the largest territorial area. You will be given a series of country names all in a string format. Your output should strictly be the name of the country with the greatest landmass from the input list. It is important that you don't output anything else but the name of the largest country in the list. Make sure to return the country name exactly as it is provided in the input list. Ensure that your assessment is based solely on the size of the countries' territorial extension, and not on any other factors.
